alert.note: Alert for Blackfoot Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact the northwest part of Blackfoot Reservoir through 315 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blackfoot Reservoir. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph, occasional lightning, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blackfoot Reservoir, Henry, and western Grays Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Blackfoot Reservoir, now would be a good time to head to shore. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
